attributes.action: Support the re-introduction of safe terraced areas at English Premier League football stadia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The introduction of all seater stadia in the English Premier league has placed a severe financial burden on economically disadvantaged football supporters. This has seen traditional supporters priced out of the game and stadium capacities slashed.
Terracing traditionally provides more affordable access. Stimulates a greater atmosphere and is as safe for the supporter as all seater stadia when constructed with all due consideration.
